channel.title: Martin Luther on Theologicus
channel.description: Recent content in Martin Luther on Theologicus

item.title: Left Up To Me, I Would Have Chosen Not God
item.description: ht: Reformation Theology “I frankly confess that, for myself, even if it could be, I should not want ‘free-will; to be given me, nor anything to be left in my own hands to enable me to endeavour after salvation; not merely because in face of so many dangers, and adversities and assaults of devils, I could not stand my ground ; but because even were there no dangers.
